entry.title: "🎵 Trains"
entry.summary:
There seems to be a new trend in music videos on the internet: train videos. Mostly so called Driver’s Eye View videos are combined with (often electronic) music.

Oldenburg label Fakeland published a mix by Überwassersystem accompanied by a video of the Berlin S-Bahn route S 41.

Railway enthuasiasts …
entry.content:
There seems to be a new trend in music videos on the internet: train videos. Mostly so called Driver’s Eye View videos are combined with (often electronic) music.

Oldenburg label Fakeland published a mix by Überwassersystem accompanied by a video of the Berlin S-Bahn route S 41.

Railway enthuasiasts around the world shoot so called Driver’s Eye View videos, often without adding adding any music, only recording the sounds of the moving train. This music video trend is a combination of two subcultures: the train culture and the music culture.

The German TV show Die schönsten Bahnstrecken Deutschlands should not be forgotten. It gained popularity because it seemed extraordinarily boring to a lot of people.
